activeBounties.title: Improved Telegram Bot
activeBounties.description: As the bot still has some issues (due to bugs in the initial bot), we want to both fix these, and expand on the functionality.

activeBounties.title: JS Telegram Sticker pack
activeBounties.description: Telegram allows for custom sticker packs to be made. These can spice up the conversation a little, and allows the Joystream Community to let their creativity and design show!

activeBounties.title: Joystream Player Loading
activeBounties.description: The current implementation of the Joystream Player takes a while to load. The scope of this bounty is to look into what can be done to reduce this.

activeBounties.title: Ledger on Joystream
activeBounties.description: Research how well the Ledger hardware wallets are supported, how to use them on the network, derivation paths and key recovery.

activeBounties.title: Repo/Docs Improvements
activeBounties.description: Improve the quality of our documentation on GitHub, by making PRs and issues.

activeBounties.title: Upload Public Domain Content
activeBounties.description: Upload videos to our testnet, and earn up to $5 per entry! We believe there are some hidden gems available out there, that are licensed permissively.

activeBounties.title: Design Community Repo Banner
activeBounties.description: Most of the active repos in the Joystream organization have branded banners in their README.md. The Community Repo also needs one!
activeBounties.notes: Design a banner for the Community Repo

closedBounties.title: Increase Validator Research
closedBounties.description: Research the costs and parameter changes associated with increasing the Validator count substantially.

closedBounties.title: Improve Telegram Bot(s)
closedBounties.description: After the upgrade, we have enabled the polkadot-js extension as part of Pioneer, this bounty is for testing the extension.

closedBounties.title: Testing of 'polkadot-js'
closedBounties.description: After the upgrade, we have enabled the polkadot-js extension as part of Pioneer, this bounty is for testing the extension.

closedBounties.title: Update Telegram Bot
closedBounties.description: As the old bot is not compatible with the new joystream-types, it needs to updated as soon as possible!
